summary: Add a Library to Solitude in the Back of the Winking Skeever.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]Description[/size][/b][/u]

[b][size=6][color=red]ALPHA Release[/color][/size][/b]

a New Library in Solitude, Help Restock it.

Don\'t know what to do with those Burnt/Damaged books, this mod Recovers Usable Books from them.

To Gain Entry to the Library you need to Pickup a Damaged/Burn book to start off the Quest.

[b][u]Potion Processing[/u][/b] [size=4]25% Working[/size] 
Add you Potions to a Pot and have the Broken down to Basic Potions.
Extract a Upgraded Version Using a point system
[u]Working[/u]
[list][*]Breakdown of 90% of Potions
[*]Restore Health
[*]Restore Magicka
[*]Restore Stamina
[*]Damage Health & Damage Health over Time 
[*]Damage Magicka & Damage Magicka over Time 
[*]Damage Stamina & Damage Stamina over Time [/list]
[u]Outstanding[/u]
[list][*]Not All Potions are Broken Down
[*]Fortify (All) Not Extracting
[*]Cure (All) Not Extracting
[*]Invisibility
[*]Resist  (All) Not Extracting
[*]Regenerate (All)  Not Extracting
[*]Stall (All) Regen  Not Extracting
[*]Waterbreathing  Not Extracting
[*]Weakness to  (All)  Not Extracting[/list]

[b][u]Weight\'s to Zero[/u][/b] [size=4]100% Working[/size]
Set the Weights of Specific Items to Zero Controlled by Clicking Specific Buttons in The Library.
[list][*]Potions
[*]Books
[*]Scrolls
[*]Potion Ingredients[/list]
The Weight is set to Zero Again on Every [b]Load[/b] of a Game

[b][u]Book Storage[/u][/b]  [size=4]99% Working[/size] There might be bugs 
48 Bookshelves Each Holding 30 books... 1440 Books
Notes go to a Small Chest on the Desk
[b][color=red][size=4]Can not Handel Elder Scrolls[/size][/color][/b]
You [b]Can\'t[/b] place books Yourself, this is handled by Magic.
All the Books can be Sorted on The Shelf\'s (button)
[b]A Spell to Convert Damaged books to Bookpacks[/b]
Trade Bookpacks for Random books at the Book Collector Each Book Earned is Also added to the Shelf System
Drop of Books at the Entrance to Help Restock the Library

[b][u]BUGS[/u][/b]
If you find any bugs please let me know so I can fix it.

[b][u][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u]
NOT Compatible with any mod that Alters the Back of the Winking Sheever Stair Well. 

[b][u][size=4]Required[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] Ver 1.6.5 or above (might work with earlier versions)

[b][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][/u]
Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager or put the contents of this mod in your Skyrim\'s data folder.
Ensure it is Loaded after the other mods that add new objects.

[b][u][size=4]Uninstall[/size][/b][/u]
If installed by the NMM (Nexus mod manger) then just uninstall using NMM

[b][u][size=4]My Other Mods[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19572]RustyTraders Harvest The Dead[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14467]RustyTraders Teleportation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22984]RustyTraders Magic Arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19798]RustyTraders Ghost Form[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28315]RustyTraders Auto Harvest[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30870]RustyTraders Solitude Library[/url]
author: RustyTrader
